mese nara billak dima kem kramaye athyawashyama angayak nowe.kese wethath junda kapa ganimen jiwitha hani sidu wime awadhanama adubawa waidya mathaya wana nisa ee asaranaya miya yawi yayi oba kalabala wiya yuthu natha.kese ho kapagath loku junda wahama wathura noyana se polithin kawarayaka dama ayis damu srujifom pettiyaka damagatha yuthuya.dan oba pujawata lasthiya.dan kala yuththe wahama gedarata gos gedara sangawa thabu wedana nashakaya pawichchi kota wedanawa danima aduwu pasu dahiriya athinam thaniwama ho ese nomathinam birindage udawwen obe junda kapa damimaya.obe junda waththe walak kapa wala damima, ballanta ho kaputanta kannata damima, wasikiliyata dama wathura gasima wani kumana ho aakarayakin soya ganimata nohaki wana se winasha kara damiya yuthuya.
